txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>You are too far away to be heard!</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>You are too far away to be heard!</rgb>
Scolded bothersome neighbours ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'Ever since I shared my family's special coney stew with my neighbours, they haven't stopped trying to hound me for the recipe. As much as I'd love to have tea at Lassa's house, I'm afraid to take a single step outside.\n\n'Unless... unless you could tell my neighbours off for me? A few sharp words will make them less eager to harass me so!'
You have properly scolded Clotild's neighbours.\n\nYou should let her know.
Cabin Fever
Clotild has asked you to let Lassa know she'll be arriving shortly.\n\nYou should return to Tighfield to pass on the good news.
'Finally, some peace and quiet. Would you mind letting Lassa know that I'll be arriving shortly?'
Talk to Clotild
<rgb=#00ff00>Scold</rgb> bothersome neighbours ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Clotild refuses to leave her house until her bothersome neighbours allow her a moment's rest.
'Hmph, fine!'
'Thank goodness, our tea can continue as planned. But don't tell me what happened to Clotild -- I'm sure she'll want to retell that story herself!'
'I didn't want that blasted recipe anyway!'
Talk to Lassa in Tighfield
'This is more trouble than it's worth.'
'How rude!'
'Forget it.'
'Okay, okay, I give up!'
<rgb=#FF0000>You are too far away to be heard!</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>You are too far away to be heard!</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>You are too far away to be heard!</rgb>
Clotild's bothersome neighbours can be found in various places throughout Gamwich.\n\nYou should scold them for harassing her.
<rgb=#FF0000>You are too far away to be heard!</rgb>
